author: ranket
title: Product Exhibition from Shikoku
description: In japan, there is no use case of ADA for shopping. On the other hand, Japan local area want to make new appeal method for their product.
solution: The discount price produced by Catalyst supporting make ADA use case, new appeal method and out reach effect for new potential ADA holders.
experience: We are the Cardano Japan community members. One of the member already supports Kittamu project, which is exploring Cardano use case project.
